cubicweb.compat.js¶

cw.utils.deprecatedFunction(msg, function)¶

jQUery flattens arrays returned by the mapping function: >>> y = [‘a:b:c’, ‘d:e’] >>> jQuery.map(y, function(y) { return y.split(‘:’);}) [“a”, “b”, “c”, “d”, “e”]

// where one would expect: [ [“a”, “b”, “c”], [“d”, “e”] ] XXX why not the same argument order as $.map and forEach ?

The only known usage of KEYS is in the tag cube. Once cubicweb-tag 1.7.0 is out, this current definition can be removed.
